span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此集合来测试打印机的功能以及配置打印作业以充分利用它们。The following example shows how to use this collection to test a printer's capabilities and configure a print job to take advantage of them. summary.span: 释放正在由 使用的非托管资源，也可以选择性地释放正在使用的托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are being used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources that are being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法未命名的布尔参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the unnamed Boolean parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`参数设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the parameter set to `false`. 布尔参数时`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的所有资源此引用。When the Boolean parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 我们建议你使用`foreach`语句来循环访问集合的所有成员。We recommend that you use the `foreach` statement to iterate through all members of the collection. 使用仅需要自定义迭代，如跳过所有其他成员。Use only when you need to customize iteration, such as by skipping every other member. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法以测试打印机的功能，并配置打印作业以充分利用它们。The following example shows how to use this method to test a printer's capabilities and configure a print job to take advantage of them. remarks.format: ## Remarks 我们建议你使用`foreach`语句来循环访问集合的所有成员。We recommend that you use the `foreach` statement to iterate through all members of the collection. 只有当你需要自定义迭代，如跳过所有其他成员时，请使用你自己的枚举器对象。Use your own enumerator object only when you need to customize iteration, such as by skipping every other member. 如果你需要你自己的枚举器，我们建议你使用泛型、 类型安全函数而不是。If you need your own enumerator, we recommend that you use the generic, type-safe function instead of . 是公共的只是为了满足的要求接口，该实现此集合的接口。The is public only to fulfill the requirements of the interface, which is implemented by this collection.
